sentence.Network_en: The duty of a godmother is to make you learn your catechism.
sentence.Network_cn: 教母的职责是帮助你学好教义问答.

sentence.Network_en: Warm, vital piety is one of the distinguishing marks of the catechism.
sentence.Network_cn: 热情而有活力的敬虔是这个教理问答独特的标记之一.

sentence.Network_en: What characteristics of God can we learn from this catechism Q & A ?

list.abs: as a matter of fact , this almost mechanical catechism is merely a dialog in form , through which the interactivity and cooperation between teachers and students cannot be virtually realized .其实，这种近乎机械的问答只是形式上的对话，根本没有真正实现教师与学生之间的互动、合作。

The catechism is used for religious instruction ., 教义问答法常用于宗教教学.

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 16th cent.: from ecclesiastical Latin catechismus, from ecclesiastical Greek katēkhizein, from (see catechize)

entry.tran: (天主教、圣公会或东正教的)教理问答，教义问答
entry.def: In a Catholic, Episcopal, or Orthodox Church, the catechism is a series of questions and answers about religious beliefs, which has to be learned by people before they can become full members of that Church.

means.word_mean: 1. a series of question put to an individual (such as a political candidate) to elicit their views
2. an elementary book summarizing the principles of a Christian religion; written as questions and answers

auth_sentence.content: The Westminster Catechism says the chief end of man is to glorify God and enjoy Him forever.
